duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare work areas and maintain cleanliness and organization throughout shift.
Produce and maintain quality food and beverage products, following standardized recipes and portioning food accurately.
Provide quality customer/patient service, addressing complaints in a professional manner.
Document equipment temperatures and alert management of malfunctioning equipment.
Operate, clean, and store equipment in assigned area, and properly clean and sanitize work surfaces.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or Equivalent preferred.
